title: Meta Betties Web3 Marketplace
description: A web3 marketplace for Meta Betties NFTs featuring an admin and user portal with stats and collectibles.
body: I developed a new version of the Meta Betties project, creating a web3 marketplace specifically for their NFTs. This platform includes an admin portal that displays statistics and a user portal showcasing individual collectibles and points earned. The marketplace supports the community-focused mission of Meta Betties, which blends digital art with social advocacy, allowing users to engage with unique NFTs that celebrate and empower the female form while raising awareness for various social issues.

title: SeidoHealth Admin Portal & Crawler
description: An admin portal developed in React, with a Django backend and a Python Playwright scraping crawler for doctor data.
body: I worked on the SeidoHealth project, where I developed an admin portal using React and a backend powered by Django. Additionally, I implemented a scraping crawler with Python and Playwright to extract doctor data from multiple hospital sites in Singapore and Hong Kong. This project supports SeidoHealthâ€™s mission of enhancing global healthcare affordability through data-driven strategies and effective provider partnerships.

title: FanCraft
description: An AI-powered platform for managing user feedback on Google Play Store and App Store, designed to enhance player engagement.
body: FanCraft is developed to streamline user feedback management and foster player loyalty. As a React Developer, I contributed to the frontend portal for managing game resources on Android and iOS. The platform automates responses and creates targeted campaigns, allowing developers to improve their apps based on valuable user insights.

title: DonorBox
description: A powerful donation platform for nonprofits and fundraisers.
body: Donorbox is a powerful donation platform designed to empower nonprofits and fundraisers. As a full stack developer, I contributed to the creation of the user dashboard and admin dashboard, along with implementing Stripe configurations for seamless payment processing.

title: Virtual Try-On Integration
description: A Python script integrating VTON models for virtual clothing try-ons, implemented in a React Native app.
body: I developed a Python script that integrates Virtual Try-On (VTON) models, enabling users to visualize clothing virtually. This functionality was seamlessly integrated into a React Native app, allowing customers to try on clothes, accessories, and more using Augmented Reality. The technology provides realistic simulations, enhancing the online shopping experience and helping users make informed decisions without physical trials.

title: Sydist Site Crawler
description: A crawler that scrapes all products from the Sydist site while navigating through pagination, built with Apify Actors and Python Playwright.
body: This project involves creating a robust crawler that efficiently scrapes all product data from the Sydist site. Utilizing Apify Actors and Python Playwright, the crawler seamlessly navigates pagination to collect comprehensive product information. This solution exemplifies the power of automation in data extraction, providing valuable insights from dynamic web content.

title: Supplier Scraper
description: A multi-site scraper developed with Scrapy and Playwright, along with a Shopify data synchronization tool.
body: Supplier Scrapper is a project that is built in combination with scrapy spiders and playwright. It scarps multiple supplier sites concurrently and store the records in postgreSQL database. It is embeded with a syncer that is focused on syncing the scraped record to live shopify store.

title: YouandSafio Site Scrapper
body: Project scope includes development of a scrapper that scraps products data from youandsafilo site, store data of each product based on categories, scrapping images, versions and details of each product.

title: LSCS Electronics Site Data Crawler
body: A scrapper that scraps products by navigating through each page

title: RTSP Stream Frame Capture
description: A web server built with Flask that captures frames from RTSP video streams and processes them to save the brightest frames.
body: This project implements a Flask web server designed to capture frames from multiple RTSP video streams concurrently. Users can start and stop streaming processes via HTTP endpoints. The application processes the captured frames to identify and save the top 9 brightest frames as a grid image, which is then displayed in an HTML response. This solution showcases the integration of real-time video processing with web technology.

title: RoboFriends
body: Udemy React Course Project: Simple React app showcasing auto-generated robots via API. Features responsive design, user-friendly interface, and practical API integration for a hands-on learning experience.

title: Bug Tracker
description: A bug management tool for technical team
body: Bug Tracker Project: Streamlined bug tracking system catering to project managers, developers, and SQA. Enhances collaboration, ensuring efficient issue monitoring and resolution.

title: Resume Bot
body:
During my training period as an Associate Engineer, I get opportunity to work on live project, In which I get opportunity to use OpenAi Vision Pro, Whisper and GPT-3 Turbo Model for implementation of amazing features of an App. 

Building on this experience, I developed a resume bot using ChatGPT. This innovative tool analyzes resumes and job descriptions, providing a percentage match to help candidates tailor their resumes for specific positions. This project not only demonstrates my technical skills but also reflects my commitment to practical solutions and efficiency in the hiring process.

title: FaceRecognition API
description: Express Backend for FaceRecognition App API endpoints
body:
Introducing my facial recognition app, utilizing the robust Clarifai Face Recognition API. Designed for developers and individuals, this tool offers a streamlined experience for precise face identification in uploaded images. 
 Its user-friendly interface, customization options, and straightforward integration make it an ideal solution for personal projects or applications requiring facial recognition capabilities. Explore the efficiency and accuracy of Clarifai's technology in my advanced facial recognition app, tailored for single users and developers.
